chain.description:
I'll help you verify the validity of the email address. However, I notice that "testing.com" is not a complete email address. A valid email address should have a username part before the "@" symbol and a proper domain.

Thought: I'll attempt to validate the email address, but I expect this will fail due to the incorrect email format.

chain.observation: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 200, 'message': 'Success', 'result': [{'email': 'testing.com', 'isValid': False, 'failureType': 'regex', 'username': 'testing.com', 'regex_validation': {'value': False, 'reason': 'Email does not contain \"@\".'}, 'typo_validation': {'value': False}, 'disposable_validation': {'value': False}, 'mx_validation': {'value': False}, 'smtp_validation': {'value': False}}]}"}

chain.description: Thought: I'll validate the email address test@gmail.com using the email validation tool.

chain.observation: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 200, 'message': 'Success', 'result': [{'email': 'test@gmail.com', 'isValid': True, 'username': 'test', 'domain': 'gmail.com', 'regex_validation': {'value': True}, 'typo_validation': {'value': True}, 'disposable_validation': {'value': True}, 'mx_validation': {'value': True}, 'smtp_validation': {'value': True}}]}"}

chain.description:
I apologize, but you've repeated the same email address that I just validated in my previous response. Let me provide a comprehensive summary of the email validation result.

Thought: I'll present the detailed validation results for test@gmail.com.

{"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "Email Validation Results for test@gmail.com:
✅ Valid Email: Yes
✅ Format Validation: Passed
✅ Domain Validation: Passed (gmail.com)
✅ Typo Check: Passed
✅ Disposable Email Check: Passed
✅ MX Record Validation: Passed
✅ SMTP Validation: Passed

The email address test@gmail.com is confirmed to be valid and deliverable."}

function.name: validate_email_for_validate_email
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "validate_email", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "“validate_email_for_validate_email” API Validates single email or bulk email addresses.

It's simple REST API to Verify and Validate single email or bulk email addresses."

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.validate_email: “Validate Email” before you send. Discover deliverability of email addresses by our most popular email verification API.
